subtitle: Liotro is a type of red orange, also called 'blood orange'.

method.text: Put water into a pan with pared rind. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 3 min. Remove from the heat. Leave to infuse for 1 hour.
Remove orange rind. Stir in sugar over a gentle heat until dissolved. Bring to boil, simmer for 3 min. Allow to cool.
Stir in orange juice. Pour into a shallow container. Freeze until slushy.

title: Liotra granita
